text:
When I use ant deploy tool to redeploy my war (undeploy and deploy), after 
finished, tomcat will increase 2 or 3 thread. and it never decrease . this bug 
in tomcat 4.1.12,4.1.18,4.1.24
creator: dragzhb@yahoo.com.cn

text:
Just tested this with the latest source from CVS (4.1.30 plus fixes) and I do 
not see any permanent increase in threads.
creator: markt@apache.org
